mapper.insert: insert into board values(default, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, default, now())
update board set view_count = view_count + 1 where id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
with like_count as ( select board_id, count(*) as like_cnt from board_like group by board_id )
select b.id, b.title, b.content, u.nickname, ifnull(lc.like_cnt, 0) as likeCount, b.view_count as viewCount, b.write_date as writeDate from board b left outer join user u on(u.id = b.writer_id) left outer join like_count lc on(lc.board_id = b.id) where 1 = 1
and( b.title like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%') )
and b.title like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%')
and u.nickname like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%')
order by b.id desc limit #{startIndex}, #{limit}
